I own several of the COOFANDY Men's Casual Vintage Bowling Shirts in various colors and patterns, and I can confidently say they offer exceptional value for the money. Each time I wear one of these vintage-style shirts, I find myself receiving compliments from friends and strangers alike, which speaks volumes about their appeal.  What I appreciate most about these shirts is the fit; they strike a perfect balance between comfort and style, making them suitable for both casual outings and slightly dressier occasions. The short sleeves allow for breathability, especially during warmer months, while the button-down design adds a touch of classic sophistication.  Additionally, the material used in these shirts is another standout feature. They resist wrinkling remarkably well, so I don’t have to worry about looking disheveled after a long day. When I do need to give them a quick touch-up with an iron, they respond beautifully, becoming crisp and fresh with minimal effort.  Overall, the COOFANDY Men's Casual Vintage Bowling Shirts have quickly become staples in my wardrobe, and I highly recommend them to anyone looking to add some stylish yet practical options to their collection. The combination of quality, fit, and timeless design makes these shirts a worthwhile investment.

I love this COOFANDY Men's Vintage Bowling Shirt.  The material is 96% Polyester and 4% Spandex; Perfect to provide enough movement and “give” for any activity.  This shirt is classy and stylish with a vintage flair that never gets old.The stitching is flawless, and care was taken to double stitch the seams.  The sleeves and bottom hem are double folded and stitched.  The collar lays nice, and the buttons and holes all line up and fit well.The shirt is light, cool, and perfect for a warm summer day or evening.  It washes and wears well with very little if any wrinkles.  If you remove it immediately from the dryer and hang it up, no ironing is needed.I just love the look and comfort of this shirt.  I was pleasantly surprised to receive many compliments when wearing it.  The wide vertical stripes down the front lend themselves to giving a taller more slimming appearance to my less than perfect body.  I definitely recommend and highly doubt you’ll be disappointed.

I absolutely love everything about this men’s casual, button-down shirt! The quality is exceptional and it is super comfortable. It fits true to size with a slightly relaxed, silhouette. My favorite thing about this shirt is its versatility. It works well as a casual shirt, but can also be dressed up or layered under a blazer. Highly recommend!

评论概述: Retro Bowling Shirt Scores a Strike in Style and Comfort
评论详情: As a longtime fan of Coofandy, I've come to expect a certain level of quality and style from their clothing. This vintage bowling shirt is no exception. The moment I put it on, I was transported back to a simpler time, when bowling alleys were the place to be and retro fashion was king.  The poppy red and white color combination is a classic, and the short sleeves and breathable fabric make it perfect for summer. Whether I'm hitting the lanes or just strolling down the boardwalk, this shirt always gets compliments.  What I love most about Coofandy is their attention to detail. The stitching is impeccable, the buttons feel sturdy, and the shirt is surprisingly wrinkle-free, even after a day out in the sun. Plus, it's incredibly comfortable to wear, thanks to the lightweight and breathable material.  If you're looking for a stylish and comfortable shirt that will turn heads, look no further than Coofandy's vintage bowling shirt. It's a testament to their commitment to quality and retro-inspired design, and it's quickly become one of my favorite wardrobe staples.
This is a nice shirt for a casual night out or vacation.  It looks great and feels good.  A nice walking around shirt with a little retro class!
Very nice looking, light weight, comfortable shirt. Not so sure about the wrinkle free part, at least not the initial shipping wrinkles, we shall see.

I ordered this shirt specifically for my cruise to the Caribbean this spring because it was advertised as being lightweight. And I can honestly say that the material was very light and it allowed room to breathe and have the Caribbean air flow through it so I was not sweating. I had several compliments from fellow cruisers on how bright and stylish the shirt was, so I knew I made the right choice. Also liked the fact that when I took this shirt out of my suitcase while on the ship, there were minimal wrinkles. All I had to do was hang it in the bathroom and the steam from the hot water took the wrinkles out. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants a nice, colorful, lightweight shirt to wear.
This is a cool, retro shirt.  The red is a bit brighter than I imagined, but it's a good looking top.

The attention to detail is evident in every aspect of this shirt, from the finely stitched seams to the carefully designed prints. Whether you opt for the retro-inspired patterns or the more subtle solid colors, each shirt is a testament to COOFANDY's commitment to quality and style. The relaxed fit and short sleeves add to the shirt's versatility, allowing you to dress it up with chinos for a night out or dress it down with shorts for a day at the beach. In addition to its timeless style and superior comfort, the COOFANDY Men's Vintage Bowling Shirt is also incredibly easy to care for. Simply toss it in the wash and hang it to dry, and it's ready to wear again in no time. This low-maintenance feature makes it a practical choice for busy men who value both style and convenience.

评论概述: Nice, a big large, light weight
评论详情: This shirt has a nice vibe to it.  Bowling shirt, but not.  It is stylistic, well made, yet a bit light on the material.  It is also quite oversized and I would take it down 1 notch when ordering.

This shirt has a nice appearance. Its vertical stripes help conceal any extra weight I have. I ordered the one in navy and white colors. Even the white buttons within the navy stripes add richness to its design. I like the fabric quality; it's not as thin as regular polyester shirts, nor is it uncomfortably thick. I can wear this shirt both in the office and outside.
Love the shirt and the sale experience was perfect!  Will be buying more.  Fit is right, according to what is shown.

The COOFANDY Men's Vintage Bowling Short Sleeve Button Down Shirt is a mixed bag, landing somewhere in the middle with a three-star rating from me. I was initially drawn to its throwback style, reminiscent of the cool, retro vibe of vintage bowling shirts. Yet, upon trying it on, I found the fabric to be a tad thinner than expected, and the stitching seemed a bit fragile in spots. While it's decent enough for casual wear or themed parties, it doesn't quite match up to the quality I had envisioned. It's not a total disappointment, but it also doesn't quite hit the mark for me in terms of durability and craftsmanship.

When I review a Coofandy item, I advise potential customers to really check out the sizing chart.  I have found, because many of their shirts are made for muscular builds, that I need to order one size down or else it is too baggy or the hem is too long.Coofandy continues to impress with their latest line of “bowling” shirts.  This one is an instant standout, particularly for those who appreciate the “what’s old is new again” motto.  The craftsmanship of the shirt is what I typically receive from Coofandy.  Attention to detail is evident in the stitching quality.  The fabric is very soft and light enough to wear on warm days.  I normally order a large, but as in my opening paragraph, sometimes I need to size down to a medium.  I’m glad I did for this one because the dimensions are spot on for my physique.  As with most Coofandy shirts, there are no collar stays.  That is fine because the fabric holds up well wash after wash without wrinkling.  An extra button is included.This shirt has a lot of sheen.  Sometimes sheen can really enhance a shirt, depending on the style.  However, for this design, I think it’s a little much.  I would give this a five-star recommendation if they toned it down.  Other than that, it’s a very nice design and if retro style is your thing, consider adding this one to your collection.
A nice blend of style and comfort. Well-made and fits nicely. Launders well and comes out of the dryer ready to wear. Great for day or night occasions.

This men’s vintage bowling shirt is a versatile shirt. It. Can be worn for casual or dress. This shirt would make a nice beach shirt. It’s lightweight and soft. Fits as expected. Colors are as expected. I recommend.

评论概述: Love the consistency of these COOFANDY shirts!
评论详情: I keep coming back to this brand because I love the styling , fit and quality of their shirts. Plus you can count on the cut being the same and when you know a specific size fits you, the next shirt of the same size will fit too. Definitely a winning brand in my book!

评论概述: Highly recommended by the absolute authority on the subject . . . my wife
评论详情: This shirt is soft and comfortable.  It runs true to size (I am 275 pounds and 6'1" and XXL fits perfectly).  It is well made (sewing is good, design is good, colors go well together).  This shirt is good enough that I would not mind wearing it to church.I machine washed it on cold and hung it to dry.  As far as I was concerned, it came out fine.  My wife then told me about a few spots that probably could have used ironing.I tend to wear suspenders normally.  Suspenders do not go well with this shirt as it is designed to be worn outside the pants.

评论概述: Great Looking, Well Cut, Super Comfy!
评论详情: This is one great looking casual shirt with style! The model in these photos is 5'8", 167 Lbs. Shirt size M.  The fabric is silky smooth, cool and very comfortable. This is a great summer shirt and can be worn with jeans or casual slacks. It's cut properly so that it fits well everywhere , and hangs nicely. And the length is just right if you wear it untucked. I got the Black/Red shirt and I really like the way it looks. It's a style that's been around for a while and isn't going anywhere any time soon. So it's a timeless design that you can wear for years to come.  HINT: To get the wrinkles out, use the steam function on your iron, but don't iron, the steam takes the wrinkles right out!

评论概述: Typical of well enough Coofandy quality.
评论详情: Build quality surpasses price point, as usual with this label. Good stitching. Material is CLEARLY synthetic, both visibly and to the touch, and some might say it feels a little rubbery, but is still wearable without being especially sweaty. Occasional loose threads but not excessive. Otherwise the cut is accurate and it drapes well. Liking it.

The sizing was spot on, something that these imported shirts don't always get quite right (I'm a large but always prefer an XL for comfort). The color is accurate to the images, and it's breathable and lightweight. The fabric almost feels like silk. Surprisingly, it doesn't wrinkle easily, and with cold water washed just fine. As the title suggests, this will be a great summer shirt!

This is a great shirt. It looks very stylish, it fits exactly as you would expect from the label size (just follow the size chart in the listing), it is cool, breathable, and comfortable, and it feels great. I've had it just over a week and have worn it twice already. Both times, I have received compliments from co-workers on the shirt's look. One called it "cool, vintage retro." I machine wash on warm and dry on low and so far, so good.

I got this for my son and he said it makes him feel hot (to the girls). He's always wearing dress shirts and this is a nice addition for the warmer weather. It's light and breathable and looks really good on him.  Would definitely buy again.

I like the design and seems to be sewn well with good buttons, but OMG it wrinkles worse than I do. 评论概述: COOFANDY Men's Vintage Bowling Short Sleeve Button Down Shirt
评论详情: My husband is not a fan. The material is too thin.  The size I ordered fit him well.  The colors are vivid, not washed out.If they had used a better material this would be a very nice shirt.

It comes vacuum sealed with a big ole 'COOFANDY' on the package. Not sure why, but I think that's a great product name. Anyway, this is a great bowling shirt. I was hoping to wear this out for things other than bowling, but given my wife's first impression I don't think that's a good idea. The shirt itself is great. It's lightweight, great quality, and has a great feel to it. The collar holds it's form pretty well and it's true to size. Because of the material, it will sit straight down - no bunches or curves. I guess I was hoping to wear it for casual use, but it's pretty much only for the bowling alley.
This is a beautiful vintage shirt. Well made, great fabric, fit perfectly. Love it

This is a great bowling style shirt. The fabric is quite thin so it will be great for summer. It came with some wrinkles I need to steam out and then it will be ready to go. The XL fits like an XL should so I would say to order your normal size.

This stylish bowling shirt harkens back to the 1950s with broad, colorful stripes of pastel blue and bright white.  The shirt is 96% polyester and 4% spandex making it durable and long lived. The fabric is also very breathable and the fabric feels like silk, which seems odd to me for a bowling shirt but it is really comfortable.  I always write my reviews for clothes while wearing them, this is no different except I think I'm going to keep wearing this all day because I like it so much.

I usually don’t wear bowling shirts. My mind has changed. The fit is comfortable and rightfully dressy. Very easy to iron and care for. I found myself loving the overall fit, too. Snug in the right areas and loose in the others. Very pleased.

This shirt perfectly combines casual comfort with retro charm, making it a standout choice for any sunny day adventure.  Designed for both style and practicality, this shirt features short sleeves for keeping cool and a button-down closure that adds a touch of sophistication. No more fussing with ironing, just throw it on and head out the door. Plus, its lightweight material ensures you'll stay comfortable even when the temperatures rise.  So whether you're hitting the beach, attending a casual gathering, or just out and about enjoying the sunshine, the COOFANDY Men's Vintage Bowling Short Sleeve Button Down Shirt is your go-to option for effortless style and comfort all summer long!
This is a nice looking shirt, with colors I like.  Stitching and quality are high.  The material is a little thin, but maybe to be expected.

This is a small XXL. For my big boy buddies, you know what I mean. This one will fit snug. It will be snug in the arms, shoulders, and belly. I wear XL Carhart shirts and button downs (those run big) and XXL button down Crate & Barrel (they are more of my body type). This one does not do me well.  The fabric wasn't agreeable, either. It felt like the knockoff Tommy Bahama clothing I bought in S Korea in 1998. Even with the 4% spandex, there wasn't much stretch. The 96% polyester didn't seem to breathe. The look is much better than the feel.

评论概述: Bowling Shirt has a Vintage Feel
评论详情: I am a bowler and I love a good vintage looking shirt. This one is made of a semi stretchy fabric and I like the black and white two-tone look. My only complaint is I wish that the sleeves were slightly longer, otherwise it's a nice shirt.

评论概述: Looks Great in the Picture. Even Better in Real Life
评论详情: I like bowling shirts, but many aren't that sharp looking. This one grabbed my attention, so I had to order, though I wasn't sure what I was going to go. It looks, fits, and feels fantastic. I may buy more in different colors.

I ordered the Medium in the Navy Blue & White color. This is an easy-to-care for shirt and comes with one extra button. It appears to be sewn nicely and is a bit loose-fitting, though I would say this fits true-to-size, as my guy can wear between a small to medium in normal clothes and this is a medium.  I deducted one star for this reason only . . . it's mostly Polyester (96%) with 4% Spandex. While this may not be an issue for you, I just wanted to point that out. I would always prefer a larger natural fiber content such as Cotton or Bamboo over Polyester due to "breathability."  The care instructions mention that it is best to not tumble dry, though I don't quite know why since this is polyester for the most part. I think you can machine wash warm and tumble dry on low to medium heat, which is what I will be doing. If anything goes awry after doing so, I will be sure to update this review. But I have machine washed and dried many polyester fabrics over the years and have found no problems with shrinking or anything else, so I would expect this fabric to be able to handle it.  Overall, it's a good-looking button-down, "bowling" style shirt and should pack well if traveling.

So I recently got his shirt & I find it very nice and comfortable & with that said, here are my initial first impressons.  Design - this is a purely objective call, but I really like the design. The look, colors are just as it shows on the web page & so I rate it @ 4.5/5.  Quality - fabric quality is good but not great. The fabric is very thin & that's probably great for summers but it can get too breazy & cold @ nights. So I rate this a 4 since this is really a summer shirt.  Workmanship - is just ok as there are areas where the seams shows if you look carefully (see photos) but it's not very obvious and so i rate it 4.  Fit - I usually wear a medium & sometimes large but when ordering online, I always go with the large size and I'm glad that I did with this one since even the "large" seem a little tight. So i rate this 3.5  Maintenance - I haven't had this for a long time but so how long will this last remains unknown. As for ironing/steaming, you most probably will need to at least steam it after wash. It took me a while to get all the creases & wrinkles out with a steamer but that was because it came in a vacuum sealed packaging so hopefully it wont be as bad after a wash. For this I rate it a 4  Overall, this is a very light, comfortable casual shirt you would want to wear in summer. it's stylish and the design and the colors are just as it looks in the ad.

评论概述: Needs more vintage and less bowling
评论详情: I really liked this shirt in the photos of the models and thought it looked like the retro style my son appreciates. Unfortunately it looks 100% bowling shirt, without the vintage vibe. He's a thin 5'11" and the medium (which is his usual size) just hung on him. The fabric is strange and I don't think it would be very comfortable in heat. He tried tucking the shirt in, wearing it open over a t-shirt, nothing he did brought it out of the bowling-shirt lane. This was a miss for us, but it may fit differently on others.
It looks pretty nice -kind'a classic- and fits quite well. The colors are also pretty decent. Overall I'd say a pretty decent shirt for this price.

评论概述: Great looking shirt and the material is silky soft.
评论详情: I'm a big fan of COOFANDY shirts and this one does not disappoint! The material is not traditional bowling shirt, but more of a cool summer shirt type. It feels silky. Quality appears to be very good, and it has laundered a couple of times now with no issues. I'm 200lbs. 5' 11" and got a Large. The fit is perfect and hangs like this type of shirt should. Overall, a definite new favorite!
Color is true to image. Size is true and fit is great.  Nice sharp appearance, casual feel and wear. Nice item.
This is really a good looking shirt.  The color blocking is excellent.  It is well sewn and the buttonholes are crisp.  The material feels nice and the Large is true to size.

To start, both my wife and daughter said it's slimming. Flattery will get them everywhere, but after seeing the photos I'd agree. Big plus for a guy with a beer gut. I have a ton of similar shirts, and this one stands out because the fabric is so much lighter weight than I'm used to. Will be wonderful in the summer heat. Nice stitching quality with no loose threads, and a quick once over with the steamer erased all the creases made by the packaging. Love it, highly recommend.

This is a nice Cuban inspired/bowling shirt that buttons up for men. I deducted a star because the material doesn’t have any cotton in it and doesnt seem very breathable, so in the summertime it will not absorb sweat, and will therefore very likely make my husband quite stinky. I will update my review if that is not the case. The medium fit him perfectly. He’s 5’ 10” and weighs about 180 pounds. Easy to dress us up or down. And it’s great with both dark or light pants. We really like the navy blue color!
